metadata.feature_description: Search templates by name or localized name using keyword search

steps.expected: Page Templates section is displayed with a search box and list of templates
steps.actual: Page Templates section displayed with 6 templates and a search box

steps.action: Enter 'Cavalier - Main' in the search box and press Enter
steps.expected: Only the 'Cavalier - Main' template should be displayed
steps.actual: Only 'Cavalier - Main' template is displayed after pressing Enter

steps.action: Enter 'Test' in the search box and press Enter
steps.expected: All templates containing 'Test' in the name should be displayed
steps.actual: 5 templates containing 'Test' were displayed: Test Template Page, Workflow Test Template, Test @#$%^&*()... Special!, Test Settings Template, Test Page Type Template

steps.action: Enter 'NonExistentTemplate12345' in the search box and press Enter
steps.actual: The template list area is empty with no templates displayed

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Clear search to show all templates

steps.action: Clear the search box and press Enter
steps.expected: All templates should be displayed again
steps.actual: All 6 templates are displayed after clearing the search

steps.action: Enter 'cavalier' (lowercase) in the search box and press Enter
steps.expected: The 'Cavalier - Main' template should be found despite case difference
steps.actual: 'Cavalier - Main' template is displayed when searching for 'cavalier' (lowercase)

steps.action: Type 'Work' slowly in the search box without pressing Enter
steps.expected: Results should filter in real-time as characters are typed
steps.actual: After typing 'Work' slowly, the template list automatically filtered to show only 'Workflow Test Template' without needing to press Enter

observations: The code repository (Dnn.AdminExperience.Evoq.Basic) appears to be empty, so code review was not possible. Testing was conducted based on UI behavior only.

Search requires pressing Enter for 'fill' operations but works in real-time for 'pressSequentially' (character-by-character) typing, suggesting the search may be triggered by keyup/input events rather than Enter key exclusively.
